LanguageData.EnergyTab.PeriodShownTooltip: Shown energy production and consumption for the last {0}.\n\nClick to change the period.
LanguageData.EnergyTab.AutoUpdateToolTip: Enables or disables updating charts. Saves TPS when disabled.
LanguageData.EnergyTab.HistoryClickToEnable:
Left click to {0} {1} on chart.
Right click to olny display {1}.
LanguageData.EnergyTab_enableUpdates_ToolTip: Enables or disables accumulation of energy consumption data. Can be disabled to save TPS on Norbalic computers.
LanguageData.EnergyTab_chartsUpdateRatePerTicks_ToolT: The number of ticks through which the information on the charts will be updated. The lower the number, the more often the charts are updated, but the stronger the impact on TPS.
LanguageData.EnergyTab_defsUpdateRatePerTicks_Tooltip: The number of ticks through which the lists of energy sources and consumers will be updated. The lower the number, the more often the lists are updated, but the stronger the impact on TPS.
LanguageData.EnergyTab_panelBrightness_Tooltip: Adjusts the brightness of the colored panels. Makes colors less saturated to make text easier to see.\n\nYou need to reload your save game to apply this changes.
